info.title: ConsumptionManagementClient
info.description: Consumption management client provides access to consumption resources for Azure Enterprise Subscriptions.

get.description: Lists the charges by billingAccountId for given start and end date. Start and end date are used to determine the billing period. For current month, the data will be provided from month to date. If there are no chages for a month then that month will show all zeroes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges based on billingAccountId by billing period.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists charges for all projects under a billing account given start and end date. Start and end date are used to determine the billing period. For current month, the data will be provided from month to date. If there are no chages for a month then that month will show all zeroes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges by project id for given start and end date. Start and end date are used to determine the billing period. For current month, the data will be provided from month to date. If there are no chages for a month then that month will show all zeroes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges based on project id by billing period.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges by billing profile id for given start and end date. Start and end date are used to determine the billing period. For current month, the data will be provided from month to date. If there are no chages for a month then that month will show all zeroes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges by billing profile id for given start and end date. Start and end date are used to determine the billing period. For current month, the data will be provided from month to date. If there are no chages for a month then that month will show all zeroes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the charges based on billingAccountId by billing period.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Download the charges based on billingAccountId.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: To get the progress of the operation, call GET operation on the URL in Azure-AsyncOperation header field.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Download the charges based on project id.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: To get the progress of the operation, call GET operation on the URL in Azure-AsyncOperation header field.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Download the charges based on billing profile id.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: To get the progress of the operation, call GET operation on the URL in Azure-AsyncOperation header field.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the credits by billingAccountId and project id for given start and end date.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the billingProfiles or events within a list of credits. By default, these fields are not included when listing monitory credits.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the credits by billingAccountId and billingProfileId for given start and end date.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the lots or events within a list of credits. By default, these fields are not included when listing monitory credits.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Download the credit events based on billingAccountId.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: To get the progress of the operation, call GET operation on the URL in Azure-AsyncOperation header field.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Download the credit events based on billing profile id.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: To get the progress of the operation, call GET operation on the URL in Azure-AsyncOperation header field.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the products by billingAccountId for given start and end date.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the products by billingProfileId for given start date and end date.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the Payment Methods by billingAccountId.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the Payment Methods by billing profile Id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

eTag.description: eTag of the resource. To handle concurrent update scenarion, this field will be used to determine whether the user is updating the latest version or not.

ChargesListResultByBillingAccount.description: Result of listing charge summary by billing account. It contains a list of available change summaries in reverse chronological order by billing period.

value.description: The list of charge summary by billing account.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

ChargeSummaryByBillingAccount.description: A charge summary resource by billing account.

ChargeSummaryPropertiesByBillingAccount.description: The properties of the charge summary by billing account.

ChargesListResultByBillingProfile.description: Result of listing charge summary by billing profile. It contains a list of available change summaries in reverse chronological order by billing period.

value.description: The list of charge summary by billing profile.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

ChargeSummaryByBillingProfile.description: A charge summary resource by billing profile.

ChargeSummaryPropertiesByBillingProfile.description: The properties of the charge summary by billing profile.

ChargesListResultByProject.description: Result of listing charge summary by project. It contains a list of available change summaries in reverse chronological order by billing period.

value.description: The list of charge summary by project.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

ChargeSummaryByProject.description: A charge summary resource by project.

ChargeSummaryPropertiesByProject.description: The properties of the charge summary by project.

ChargeSummaryProperties.description: The properties of the charge summary.

billingPeriodId.description: The id of the billing period resource that the usage belongs to.

BillingAccountProperties.description: The properties of the billing account.

address.description: The address associated with billing account.

currency.description: The ISO currency, for example, USD.

country.description: The country associated with billing account..

projects.description: The projects associated to the billing account.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the billing account.

enrollmentDetails.description: The details about the associated legacy enrollment. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

departments.description: The departments associated to the enrollment.

enrollmentAccounts.description: The accounts associated to the enrollment.

BillingProfileProperties.description: The properties of the billing profile.

eligibleOffers.description: The eligible offers attached to the project.

costCenter.description: The cost center for the project.

CreditSummaryProperties.description: The properties of the credit summary.

events.description: The events associated to credit summary.

Event.description: The credit event associated to credit summary.

ProductsListResult.description: Result of listing products summary. It contains a list of available products summaries in reverse chronological order by purchase date.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

ProductsSummaryProperties.description: The properties of the product summary.

displayName.description: The display name of the product.

lastCharge.description: Last charge associated with the purchase.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

PaymentMethodProperties.description: The properties of the payment method.

EligibleOfferProperties.description: The properties of an Eligible Offer.

parentAssetId.description: The id of the parent asset.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the eligible offer.

enrollmentAccounts.description: Associated enrollment accounts. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

department.description: Associated department. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

policies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment.

availabilityId.description: The availability id used by purchase.

legacyId.description: The legacy id of the product.

EnrollmentPolicies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment

reservedInstancesEnabled.description: The reserved instances flag for Enrollment

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2018-05-31.
